TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi WindowsFormsHost extends System.Windows.Interop.HwndHost implements class System.Windows.Interop.IKeyboardInputSink
type WindowsFormsHost = class inherit HwndHost interface IKeyboardInputSink

summary.span: 一个元素，它允许在 WPF 页上托管 Windows 窗体控件。

span.span: An element that allows you to host a Windows Forms control on a WPF page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用元素放置在 WPF 元素或页面中的 Windows 窗体控件。Use the element to place a Windows Forms control within your WPF element or page. 若要承载 Windows 窗体控件或窗体中的 WPF 元素，使用控件。To host a WPF element in a Windows Forms control or form, use the control. > [!NOTE] > 使用安装 WindowsFormsIntegration.dll[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]程序集。WindowsFormsIntegration.dll is installed with the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] assemblies. 程序集的默认位置为 %programfiles%\Reference Assemblies\Microsoft\Framework\v3.0\WindowsFormsIntegration.dll。The default location for the assembly is %programfiles%\Reference Assemblies\Microsoft\Framework\v3.0\WindowsFormsIntegration.dll. 若要托管 WPF 元素中的 Windows 窗体控件，必须将分配到在 Windows 窗体控件属性。To host a Windows Forms control in a WPF element, you must assign the Windows Forms control to the property. 使用属性分配自定义映射之间元素和其托管的 Windows 窗体控件。Use the property to assign custom mappings between a element and its hosted Windows Forms control. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Windows 窗体和 WPF 属性映射](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md)。For more information, see [Windows Forms and WPF Property Mapping](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md). ## XAML 对象元素用法XAML Object Element Usage ``` ``` ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用元素来承载控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use a element to host a control. 有关详细信息，请参阅[演练： 承载 Windows 窗体控件中通过使用 XAML 的 WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-hosting-a-windows-forms-control-in-wpf-by-using-xaml.md)。For more information, see [Walkthrough: Hosting a Windows Forms Control in WPF by Using XAML](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-hosting-a-windows-forms-control-in-wpf-by-using-xaml.md). [!code-xaml[HostingWfInWpfWithXaml#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HostingWfInWpfWithXaml/CSharp/HostingWfInWpf/Window1.xaml#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此依赖项属性由字段。This dependency property is identified by the field. 默认情况下，此属性将映射更新和承载控件的属性。By default, this property is mapped to update the and properties of the hosted control. 有关详细信息映射属性，请参阅[Windows 窗体和 WPF 属性映射](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md)。For more information on mapping the property, see [Windows Forms and WPF Property Mapping](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md). ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ```

The window handle for this object.

member this.Child : System.Windows.Forms.Control with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置由 元素承载的子控件。

span.span: Gets or sets the child control hosted by the element.

value.span: 托管的 Windows 窗体控件。

span.span: The hosted Windows Forms control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只有一个子控件可以承载，但可以有任意数量的子级。Only one child control can be hosted, but can have any number of children. 子控件不能为顶级窗体。The child control cannot be a top-level form. 如果是，窗体的属性设置为`false`。If is a , the form's property is set to `false`. ## XAML 文本使用情况XAML Text Usage `<` *对象* `>``<` *object* `>` `<` *hostedControl* `.../>``<` *hostedControl* `.../>` ```` ## XAML 值XAML Values *object**object* 一个元素 （或可能的子类）。A element (or a possible subclass). *hostedControl**hostedControl* 一个指定托管的 Windows 窗体控件的元素。An element that specifies the hosted Windows Forms control. 指定在标记中的自定义控件通常需要以 xmlns 映射中，请参见[XAML 命名空间和 WPF XAML 的 Namespace 映射](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml.md)。Specifying the custom control in markup usually requires an xmlns mapping, see [XAML Namespaces and Namespace Mapping for WPF XAML](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用要添加到所承载的控件属性元素。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to add the hosted control to the element. 有关详细信息，请参阅[演练： 承载 ActiveX 控件在 WPF 中](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-hosting-an-activex-control-in-wpf.md)。For more information, see [Walkthrough: Hosting an ActiveX Control in WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-hosting-an-activex-control-in-wpf.md). [!code-csharp[HostingAxInWpf#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HostingAxInWpf/CSharp/HostingAxInWpf/window1.xaml.cs#11)] [!code-vb[HostingAxInWpf#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HostingAxInWpf/VisualBasic/HostingAxInWpf/window1.xaml.vb#11)]

exception.span: 尝试将顶级窗体指定为要承载的控件。

summary.span: 使 在从 WPF 中以无模式方式打开时能正确运行。

span.span: Enables a to function correctly when it is opened modelessly from WPF.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用方法，以转发所有键盘消息时无模式方式打开。Call the method to forward all keyboard messages when a is opened modelessly. 方法安装是无模式窗体由 WPF 打开时能正确运行所需的消息筛选器。The method installs a message filter that is required for modeless forms to function correctly when opened by WPF. 您需要为特定调用此方法一次实例。You need to call this method only once for a particular instance.

summary.span: 获取或设置托管控件的字体系列。

span.span: Gets or sets the hosted control's font family.

value.span: 托管控件中使用的字体系列。

span.span: The font family used in the hosted control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性设置会影响其模板将此属性作为参数这些控件。This property setting affects only those controls whose template uses the property as a parameter. 它具有对其他控件没有影响。It has no effect on other controls. 此依赖项属性由字段。This dependency property is identified by the field. 默认情况下，此属性将映射更新所承载控件的属性。By default, this property is mapped to update the property of the hosted control. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Windows 窗体和 WPF 属性映射](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md)。For more information, see [Windows Forms and WPF Property Mapping](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md). ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ```

span.span: The available size for the object.

summary.span: 重写 的基类实现以度量 对象的大小并将正确的大小返回给布局引擎。

span.span: Overrides the base class implementation of to measure the size of a object and return proper sizes to the layout engine.
The desired size of the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks WPF 布局中的大小约束是硬约束。Size constraints in WPF layout are hard constraints. 如果超过了约束，主机必须在托管区域内剪辑内容。If the constraints are exceeded, the host must clip the content within the hosted region. 此方法的实现强制实施此行为。The implementation of this method enforces this behavior.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用方法可能有必要，当某个祖先元素的属性已更改，但的本地值元素未发生更改。Calling the method may be necessary when a property of an ancestor element has changed, but the local value of the element has not changed. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Windows 窗体和 WPF 属性映射](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md)。For more information, see [Windows Forms and WPF Property Mapping](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md).

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property PropertyMap As PropertyMap

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取属性映射，该属性映射决定了设置 元素的属性会对托管的 Windows 窗体控件产生何种影响。

span.span: Gets the property map that determines how setting properties on the element affects the hosted Windows Forms control.

value.span: 一个，它映射上托管的 Windows 窗体控件的属性的属性。

span.span: A that maps properties to properties on the hosted Windows Forms control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Windows 窗体和 WPF 技术有两个相似但不同属性模型。The Windows Forms and WPF technologies have two similar but different property models. *属性映射*支持两种体系结构之间的互操作。*Property mapping* supports interoperation between the two architectures. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Windows 窗体和 WPF 属性映射](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md)。For more information, see [Windows Forms and WPF Property Mapping](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何添加的映射属性设置为控件。The following code example shows how to add a mapping for the property to a control. [!code-csharp[PropertyMappingWithWfh#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PropertyMappingWithWfhSample/CSharp/PropertyMappingWithWfh/Window1.xaml.cs#12)] [!code-vb[PropertyMappingWithWfh#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PropertyMappingWithWfhSample/VisualBasic/PropertyMappingWithWfh/Window1.xaml.vb#12)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance valuetype System.Windows.Vector ScaleChild(valuetype System.Windows.Vector newScale) cil managed
Protected Overridable Function ScaleChild (newScale As Vector) As Vector
abstract member ScaleChild : System.Windows.Vector -> System.Windows.Vector override this.ScaleChild : System.Windows.Vector -> System.Windows.Vector

span.span: The new scale factor.

summary.span: 缩放托管的 Windows 窗体控件并跟踪比例因子。

span.span: Scales the hosted Windows Forms control, and tracks the scale factor.

returns.span: 一个 ，表示应用于托管的 Windows 窗体控件的比例因子。

span.span: A which represents the scale factor applied to the hosted Windows Forms control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Windows 窗体控件不支持缩放为 WPF 元素相同的方式。Windows Forms controls do not support scaling in the same way as WPF elements. 例如，缩放到 0.5 的比例因子为 1 中的一个 Windows 窗体控件和回因子为 1 时未，一般情况下，恢复该控件的原始大小。For example, scaling a Windows Forms control from a factor of 1 to a factor of 0.5 and back to a factor of 1 does not, in general, recover the original size of the control. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [WindowsFormsHost 元素的布局注意事项](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/layout-considerations-for-the-windowsformshost-element.md)。For more information, see [Layout Considerations for the WindowsFormsHost Element](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/layout-considerations-for-the-windowsformshost-element.md). 重写方法以提供自定义的缩放行为的托管 Windows 窗体控件。Override the method to provide custom scaling behavior for the hosted Windows Forms control.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int TabIndex { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.TabIndex : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置托管控件的选项卡索引。

span.span: Gets or sets the hosted control's tab index.

value.span: 用于选项卡导航和焦点的选项卡索引。

span.span: The tab index for tab navigation and focus.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此依赖项属性由字段。This dependency property is identified by the field. 此属性用于更改窗体上控件之间的 tab 键导航顺序。Use this property to change the order of tab navigation among the controls on a form. 具有较低的选项卡索引的控件将获得焦点之前具有较高索引的控件。A control with a lower tab index will get focus before a control with a higher index. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ```

span.span: A that specifies the focus behavior.

summary.span: 将焦点从 WPF 转移到托管的 Windows 窗体控件。

span.span: Forwards focus from WPF to the hosted Windows Forms control.

returns.span: 如果控件已激活，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if a control was activated; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当元素收到从选项卡命令中的方法，首次有资格控制接收焦点。When a element receives a TAB command from the method, the first eligible control in receives focus. 通过指定的第一个控件`request`参数。The first control is specified by the `request` parameter. 当`request`是的行为是类似于按下 TAB 键。When `request` is , the behavior is similar to pressing the TAB key. 当`request`是的行为是类似于按下 SHIFT + TAB。When `request` is , the behavior is similar to pressing SHIFT+TAB.
